activities: OPTiMO does not collect personal information from its website.  Users are able to submit information voluntarily for business purposes.  This information is kept secure and in confidence until it is no longer needed, at which point it is destroyed.  It is never shared with third parties or used for marketing purposes by anyone.

recoursemech: OPTiMO is committed to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives.
